Hi all masters here  i hv a doubt. I hv uob one account with uob lady spending with $500 now. I took part the uob big saving using uob one account.Could I apply another UOB lady account with $20k deposit to get uob big savings and also additional miles of 2 UNI$?So both UoB ONE accoutn and UOb lady accoutn will base on one same uob lady spendings of $500 only..Any prob?
2nd Senario..He should use the money or invest SRS for share then putting in the mortgage.. we told him but he feel that at age of 40..he shouldn't have too much commitment

Should not put 20k. 10k is enough. 0.05% p.a. is a very horrible rate. And no  if you already take part in the promo you cannot take part again.And to be net positive for the 2mpd on Lady's Card (not Solitaire)  you have to spend 1k not only 500.

There‚Äôs no right or wrong in both scenarios. There‚Äôs nothing to agree or disagree about.If his investment yield a higher rate than his loan interest rate  then sure. But he can still pay it off early then any future cash flow he gets can still be put into investment. Don‚Äôt see what‚Äôs the conflict here. It‚Äôs just a chicken and egg issueWhats the link between income tax and paying off mortgage?
That's from 2 months ago. The next promo is in Jul  if there is.
Depends on the interest rate obtained
